definition: for this reason/with regards to this/in this respect/in order to do this/to this end

sentences.english: Thellonking is one of the most productive activities a human being can undertake.
sentences.chinese: 念考是此中最出产性活动己的总称能够举行。

sentences.english: Offenses with this characteristic usually will be encountered as assimilative crimes.
sentences.chinese: 带有此特征的犯罪行为通常将视为同等犯罪。

sentences.english: Endoscopic ultrasonography and computerized tomography demonstrated the lesion to be a cyst in nature.
sentences.chinese: 内视镜超音波与电脑断层检查也证明此病灶为囊状物。

sentences.english: This branch is obsoleted. Engineering resource will no longer be invested on this branch in general.
sentences.chinese: 此分支已淘汰，除特殊状况人力不再投注于此版上。

sentences.english: The receptive apex of the pistil of a flower, on which pollen is deposited at pollination.
sentences.chinese: 雌蕊花柱顶部，授粉时花粉被旋转于此。

sentences.english: Please lay the maxim to your heart.
The Distributor is authorized to sub-contract and assign the distribution and sales of the Products to sub-contractors of Fangyuan Group.
sentences.chinese: 发行人已授权转包及销售此产品给方园集团的转包商。

sentences.english: Please click here for past issues of "e-Newsletter".
sentences.chinese: 查阅前期《电子快讯》请按此。

sentences.english: For these reasons, Provo tied for second-to-last inisland rankings published in the November/December 2007 issue of themagazine.
sentences.chinese: 由于这些原因，普罗伏在此榜单上位列倒数第二。

sentences.english: Confucius about drinking water and a single scoop sparse Louxiang refers only to this aspect.
sentences.chinese: 孔子谈疏食饮水和单瓢陋巷指的都只是此一面。

sentences.english: Using this function, we can get more representational eigenvector from email.
sentences.chinese: 利用此函数可提取到更具有代表性的邮件特征向量。

sentences.english: There, I've said it -- it feels so good to have that off my chest.
sentences.chinese: 在此，我已经说过能够脱离开书架让我感觉非常好。

sentences.english: Answer this question, and write an algorithm for the follow-up general case.
sentences.chinese: 回答此问题，并编写算法求解思考题。

sentences.english: The beholder likes to use this ray on any foe it considers a real threat.
sentences.chinese: 眼魔喜欢将此射线用于它认为真正有威胁的对手。

sentences.english: It is not visible outside the package.
At this price, OQ is the maximum quantity that can be sold.
sentences.chinese: 在此价格上，OQ是能够售出的最大产量。

definition: should/ought to/probably/must be/to deserve/to owe/to be sb's turn to do sth/that/the above-mentioned
and/moreover/yet/for the time being/to be about to/both (... and...)
and/furthermore/also/together with/(not) at all/simultaneously/to combine/to join/to merge
